site_name: Earls Court 2 Empress Approach London SW6 1TW
description: This council has been asked for its observations on application submitted to Hammersmith & Fulham Council (2023/02631/FUL) Temporary installation of five padel courts, with associated enclosures, entrance arch structure and floodlighting; six single and two-storey portacabin units (including food stalls, wellness room, bar, office and reception); for use as outdoor padel sports and recreation (Class F.2) with access from Empress Place, for an operational period from October 2023 until December 2025; associated groundworks, drainage, means of enclosure, lighting, servicing and cycle parking (See also Advertisement Consent Application ref: 2023/02632/ADV for the temporary installation of non-illuminated signage on the portacabin units and entrance archway signage associated with the proposed temporary use).
